derivation: feminine singular participle of a comparative of G1909 (ἐπιοῦσα) and (to go);
strongs_def: supervening, i.e. (G2250 (ἐπιοῦσα) or G3571 (ἐπιοῦσα) being expressed or implied) the ensuing day or night
outline:
1. to come upon, approach
    1. of time, to come on, be at hand, next, following, on the following day
